name: IOUSBHostInterface
desc: The class for accessing USB-related services.

items.name: var configurationDescriptor: UnsafePointer<IOUSBConfigurationDescriptor>
items.desc: The configuration descriptor for the interface.

items.name: func selectAlternateSetting(Int)
items.desc: Selects an alternative setting for the interface.

items.name: func copyPipe(withAddress: Int) -> IOUSBHostPipe
items.desc: Copies a pipe for a specific endpoint address.

items.name: func setIdleTimeout(TimeInterval)
items.desc: Sets the desired idle suspend timeout for the interface.
